CLASS.name: SUBSTANCES WITH ABSORPTION REDUCED BY GASTRO-INTESTINAL TARGETED MEDICATIONS, ANTACIDS, AND ABSORBANTS
GASTRO-INTESTINAL TARGETED MEDICATIONS, ANTACIDS, AND ABSORBANTS

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the absorption of these substances
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the gastro-intestinal targeted medications, antacids, absorbants at a different time from these substances (more than 2 hours apart, if possible).
